thread.title: Apple Loses Music Executive

author: Daisuke Wakabayashi
title: Apple Loses Music Executive
text:
Apple Inc. is losing one of the main executives behind its new music service.
The company said Ian Rogers, one of the key executives retained by Apple when it acquired Beats last year for $3.2 billion, has resigned and is leaving the company.
